description: Main source file for a Flutter-based Android TV frontend, containing application entry point, HomeScreen widget, state management, UI components, navigation logic, and associated classes.

classes.name: HomeData
classes.description: Data model representing the JSON data for the home screen, including title, tags, synopsis, hero poster URL, and recommendations.

classes.name: HomeScreen
classes.description: Stateful Flutter widget that displays the main home interface with hero banner, recommendations, and navigation handling.

classes.name: _HomeScreenState
classes.description: State class managing the HomeScreen widget, including data loading, focus management, background animations, and UI composition.

classes.name: _VignettePainter
classes.description: Custom painter rendering a vignette overlay for visual effect in the background.

classes.name: DirectionalFocusIntent
classes.description: Custom intent class used to move focus in a specified direction within the UI navigation system.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Application entry point which initializes and runs the TvApp widget.

methods.name: _loadHome
methods.description: Asynchronously loads home data either from local assets or external data source, updating the widget state.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for the HomeScreen, including animated background, content, and navigation.

methods.name: _buildContent
methods.description: Constructs the main content layout of the home screen, including hero banner and recommendations.

methods.name: _handleDirectionalFocus
methods.description: Handles focus movement in a specified direction based on D-pad input.
